title: We charleston the world
text:
On longer trips, we have done dance videos in the style of “we charleston the world”, although we don’t only charleston, but also dance lindy hop, shag and balboa.














We charleston Iceland






Sara Hänzi


Jul 15, 2024

We charleston New Zealand

title: We charleston Australia
text:
Another six weeks in down under.

Music: Devil’s dance by Big Bad Voodoo Daddy

title: We charleston Iceland
text:
Slightly more than five weeks in Iceland - plenty of time to go all around the island and explore plenty of “foss” (waterfall). 
Music: Swing Gitan by the Shirt Tail Stompers

title: We charleston Switzerland
text:
A veritable “Tour de Suisse”, though of course focusing on steeper parts.

Music: Everybody by the Schwings Band

title: We charleston Sout-East Asia
text:
Three months across Sout-East Asia. The food was amazing!

Music: Joshua fit the battle by Gordon Webster

title: We charleston New Zealand
text:
Our first attempt at a dance video - the trip was fun, the video could be improved!

Music: Baby can dance by Carsie Blanton
